traits.name: Aether Breath
traits.description: 'For every {0} Aether consumed by allies: Applies {1} {Power} to this monster and triggers an {Attack} against all enemies for [3] x [2] {Wild damage}.'

traits.name: Flawless Defense
traits.description: {Retaliate}: Applies {0;1} {Shield} to self.\nFor every {1;0} {Shield} gained, gain {Power}.

traits.name: Magnus Hit
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Deals a [Hit] with damage equal to the total amount of {Power} in the party.'

traits.name: Meditation
traits.description: 'On every {0} {Support Actions}: Applies {Power} to self.'

traits.name: Momentum
traits.description: 'On every {0} {Attacks}: Applies {Power} to self.'

traits.name: Overwhelming Heat
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Applies {1} Burn to target enemy for every {Power} stack on this monster.'

traits.name: Peak Calamity
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally [attacks] an enemy with {0} or more {Terror}: Applies {Power} to that ally.'

traits.name: Power Generator
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Power} applied to allies: Generates [1] {random Aether}.'

traits.name: Power Healing
traits.description: 'Whenever {Power} is applied to this monster: Heals each ally for {1}.'

traits.name: Prime Absorption
traits.description: 'For every {0} damage absorbed by {Shields} on allies: Applies {Power} to the ally with the lowest amount of {Power}.'

traits.name: Serpentine Maneuvers
traits.description: 'For every {0} [Hits] evaded by your allies: Applies {Power} to the ally with the lowest amount of {Power}.'

traits.name: Support Attacks
traits.description: '{On Support Action}: Deals a {3} damage [Hit] to {target enemy} and triggers {On Attack} effects.'

traits.name: Tainted Power
traits.description: 'Whenever {Power} is applied to an ally: Applies {Power} and {1;1} {Affliction} to them. '

traits.name: Ascension
traits.description: 'For every {0} healing of your allies: Applies {1} {Power} to each ally.'

traits.name: Auto Heal
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Heals the ally with the lowest health by {2} x {1}.'

traits.name: Blood Pact
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: Deals a {Water} [Hit] to all enemies; damage equals [1] for every {0} healing received by allies this round.'

traits.name: Cleanse Corruption
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally is healed to full health: Cleanses {1} {Corruption} from them.'

traits.name: Conversion Pact
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: Deals a {Fire}/{Water} hit to all enemies; damage equals debuffs cleansed or consumed from allies this round.'

traits.name: Cosmic Healing
traits.description: 'For every {0} healing of your allies: Generates {1} {Wild} Aether.'

traits.name: First Aid
traits.description: 'Whenever {Regeneration} is applied to an ally: Heals them for {1}.'

traits.name: Healing Hex
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy’s {Weakness} is consumed: Heals the ally with the lowest health for {1}.'

traits.name: Quicken
traits.description: 'For every {0} healing this monster receives or applies to other monsters: Applies {Sidekick} to self.'

traits.name: Recovery
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: This monster heals itself equal to [1]/{0} of the damage it took last round.'

traits.name: Synchronous Healing
traits.description: 'Whenever you reach {5} [Aether] of the same element: Heals all allies for {2} x {1}.'

traits.name: Experienced Strikes
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} {Age}: Applies {Sidekick} to self. {Sidekick} on this monster deals additional damage equal to the amount of {Age} stacks on it.'

traits.name: Exploit
traits.description: '{On Interrupt}: Applies {Sidekick} to self.'

traits.name: Helping Winds
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Wind} [Aether] consumed by allies: Applies {Sidekick} to self.'

traits.name: Indomitable Attacks
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Cleanses {0;1} debuffs from self and heals self for {1;1}.'

traits.name: Joint Protection
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally triggers {Sidekick}: {Shields} both attackers for {0}.'

traits.name: Leadership
traits.description: As long as this monster has {Sidekick}, other allies gain +{0} {Damage}.

traits.name: Make It Double
traits.description: '{Sidekick} {Attacks} on allies deals {2} x {2} damage [Hits].'

traits.name: Martial Prowess
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally evades a [Hit]: Applies {Sidekick} to them. '

traits.name: Sidecrits
traits.description: This monster’s {Sidekick} {Attack} is always {critical}.

traits.name: Sidekick Generator
traits.description: 'Whenever {Sidekick} is applied to this monster: Generates {1} {random Aether}.'

traits.name: Slasher
traits.description: '{Attacks} of your allies increase the amount of {Terror} on the [attacked] enemies by {0%}, rounded up, instead of consuming stacks. At the end of your turn: {1%} of all {Terror} stacks on enemies are consumed, rounded up.'

types.name: TypeSidekick
types.description: This Type focuses on Sidekick stacks, which can trigger extra Attacks and quickly overwhelm enemies.

types.name: TypeHeal
types.description: This Type focuses on healing allies and providing strong utility effects through healing.

types.name: TypePower
types.description: This Type focuses on Power stacks, which can build up to huge raw damage the longer the fight goes on.
